_sText:
Welcome to Surf_Time_Limit!!

First off, I guess I should explain why it's named Surf_Time_Limit. I was really bored around 1 o'clock in the morning a few weeks back, and I decided to give myself a set amount of time to make a map. For some odd reason, I decided three hours should be a half decent amount of time to create something well, half decent. I decided to split it into 1 hour for build/textures, optimization, and design.

The map itself is pretty straight forward. It is a bit of a get a gun and kill people surf, and it is actually a lot of fun. Yes, for all of you who complain, there is a jail, although there really isn't much of a point to it, but it compliments the map quite nicely.

**********************************************

Final Changes/Additions/Fixes:
-No more spawn jumping/killing
-The first ramp turn around to Awp's is no longer possible
-Re-texture
-Additional entrances to jail/decreased camping
-A friend on UAkron suggested knives only in Jail. Now all weapons are stripped on entry to jail and you are left with a knife. (Makes it easier for the people on top of jail.)
- Took the doors off of the frames. (Another suggestion from UAkron) Now you can just walk through the portals to your destination
-Took out pieces of the awfully cluttered spiral ramps. It's now a bit more difficult to surf.
-Every player is equipped with a P228 and full Kevlar and helmet at the beginning of every round.
- Optimization changes
-Increased some of the sizes of the water pools

(There have been a lot of changes to this map to make it the best it could be with the design that I originally used. Many will agree with me when I say that the original design could have been more thought out, so I see no point in working on this any further. These changes should increase the popularity of the map, and the enjoyment of the surf.)

All questions/complaints/comments/advice/opinions:

Xfire: Wowyourgaiy
Email: Phantomoper3@comcast.net
